name: my-personal-website
title: Astro Vitesse, inspired by antfu.me
desc: Build beautiful, accessible, high-performance blog websites with Astro
article:
Install

npx astro add astro-vitesse

Usage

create a `uno.config.ts` file


import { defineConfig } from 'astro-vitesse/theme'

export default defineConfig({})


add unocss integration


import { defineConfig } from 'astro/config'
import vitesse from 'astro-vitesse'
import UnoCSS from 'unocss/astro'

// https://astro.build/config
export default defineConfig({
  integrations: [
    vitesse({
      title: 'My Awesome Site',
    }), 
    UnoCSS()
  ],
})

github.name: astro-vitesse
github.description: Build beautiful, accessible, high-performance blog websites with Astro
